nodes.title: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More secure with MetaMask and MoonPay
image.description: Making DeFi onboarding more secure with MetaMask and MoonPay.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is deeply passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. Next up, MoonPay.

MoonPay is a leading crypto company that lets users buy and sell digital assets directly with their MetaMask wallet. Since MoonPay‚Äôs partnership with MetaMask began in 2022, we‚Äôve been dedicated to simplifying the management of cryptocurrencies, while keeping users secure. Let‚Äôs dive into the ways our collaboration achieves this.

Streamlining DeFi onboarding

As the demand for self-custodial wallets has risen, so too has the need for robust and intuitive tools that give users a frictionless ‚Äúweb2-like‚Äù experience. In the past, the two haven‚Äôt always mixed well. Newcomers to crypto, who typically have the highest appetite for intuitive UX, tend to find DeFi overly complex.

Recognizing this tension, MoonPay saw an opportunity to bridge-the-gap by providing seamless cash-to-crypto onboarding to the world‚Äôs leading self-custodial wallet, MetaMask. Integrating with MoonPay allowed MetaMask‚Äôs millions of users to interface with DeFi through familiar payment options like credit cards, debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. It also allowed MetaMask users to benefit from MoonPay‚Äôs stringent security protocols.

Simplifying ramps to protect users

One of the key advantages of the integration is that users can purchase digital assets directly within MetaMask wallet ‚Äî eliminating the need to navigate multiple platforms. This approach smoothes out the process, while keeping users‚Äô information safe. By avoiding unnecessary third-party platforms, data exposure is minimized.

In addition to decreasing exposure by helping users stay within the platform, MoonPay is committed to protection and security in various ways:

  • Our ramps are built with advanced encryption technology like AES-256.
  • We comply with PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001, and ISO 27018 standards, ensuring we meet stringent data security criteria.
  • Our systems have undergone independent audits for PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001/27018, and SOC2 Type 2 certifications, giving users peace of mind that our safety standards don‚Äôt waver.
  • Our rigorous Anti-Money Laundering and Know Your Customer policies helps prevent bad actors from entering our ecosystem.

Creating a more secure web3

As we continue to work alongside MetaMask, our shared focus on safe, user-friendly solutions remains a cornerstone of this partnership. Together, we‚Äôre not only simplifying crypto onboarding for newcomers ‚Äì we‚Äôre setting the bar for what it means to prioritize security in web3.

Buying and selling crypto with your MetaMask wallet via MoonPay has never been easier. It‚Äôs easy, fast, and safe. Get started today.

nodes.metaTitle: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.metaDescription: Find out how MetaMask and MoonPay enable DeFi onboarding that is secure and seamless.

nodes.title: How to buy crypto
nodes.subtitle: Go from cash to crypto.

image.title: How to buy crypto
image.description: Explore the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Wondering how to buy crypto, but not sure where to start? You‚Äôve come to the right place. Buying crypto with MetaMask is speedy, simple, and safe.

You can buy crypto straight into MetaMask using payment methods like a credit card, debit card, bank account, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. No need for centralized exchanges. Select from thousands of your favorite tokens on over 15 networks including Ethereum, Linea, Base, and more. The choice is yours.

We're driven by making the process of buying crypto quick and cost-effective. So we've cut out all of the unnecessary steps ‚Äì¬†saving you time, and money on excess fees too.

We also know that safety is essential when it comes to your digital assets. MetaMask is crypto's most secure wallet for good reason. Our security is industry-leading and razor-tight, so you can buy (and sell, swap, stake, and bridge) with peace of mind. Plus, if you need help along the way, our 24/7 world class support team is always here to assist around-the-clock.

Below, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you how to buy crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! ü¶ä

How to buy crypto with MetaMask Extension

Clicking the Buy & Sell button on the MetaMask extension will redirect you to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Buy.
  3. Select your region, and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  5. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH Example: $100 of ETH.
  6. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers.
  8. You'll be securely redirected to the provider's website to complete the purchase, and funds will be deposited into your MetaMask wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

How to buy crypto with MetaMask app

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Buy.
  4. Select your region and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  7. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers.
  9. Complete the transaction on the provider‚Äôs portal, and link your desired payment method.
  10. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and confirm the transaction to get crypto in your wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

Ready to get started? If you‚Äôre on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide about buying crypto

nodes.metaDescription: Explore the ways to buy crypto directly using your debit card, credit card, PayPal, and bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps‚Äîfraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask‚Äôs new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.
